name: ABC
text:
COMING UP: He's the man President Trump doesn't want you to hear.

Now, John Bolton, Trump’s former trusted national security adviser, finally speaks out. What will he say?

Don’t miss this news making event special—starts at 9/8c on @ABC. https://t.co/TrDMhiYdKp https://t.co/kJsmnsD4KN

name: ABC
text: Third-party standing could impact abortion cases down the road. https://t.co/X5FcIKZNQ9

name: ABC
text: RT @ABCWorldNews: BOLTON EXCLUSIVE: @MarthaRaddatz has more from her exclusive interview with John Bolton, pressing him on his explosive allegations against President Trump in his new book – and why he’s going public now. The full interview airs tonight at 9|8c on @ABC. https://t.co/t5DR5Tm6qG https://t.co/OsNKAUg7SS

name: ABC
text: A dozen states have seen record highs of new COVID-19 cases since Friday, an @ABC News analysis has found. https://t.co/i3aQXHLbp0

name: ABC
text:
John Bolton, Pres. Trump's longest-serving national security adviser, goes one-on-one with @MarthaRaddatz.

The special event starts now on @ABC. https://t.co/ugOLXbXInK https://t.co/2mGwtBqPQN

name: ABC
text: John Bolton on Pres. Trump: "When it comes to reelection, his attention span was infinite…It's just too bad there wasn't more of that when it came to national security.” https://t.co/nI9KzsYyZL https://t.co/B8bgrfn9dP

name: ABC
text: NEW: John Bolton on letters to Pres. Trump he believed to be from North Korean leader Kim Jong Un: "I think Kim Jong Un gets a huge laugh out of this...Yet, the president has looked at them as evidence of this deep friendship." https://t.co/MoKEz7WP1E https://t.co/n8fVsqc7hq

name: ABC
text:
.@MarthaRaddatz: “How would you describe Trump's relationship with Vladimir Putin?”

John Bolton: “I think Putin thinks he can play him like a fiddle.” https://t.co/lhlnTwWPfm https://t.co/rMU80KNJrR

name: ABC
text:
EXCLUSIVE: John Bolton says Pres. Trump has left the U.S. in a "weaker position around the world."
 
"Whether it's after four years or eight years, whoever succeeds the Trump administration is going to have an enormous amount of repair work to do." https://t.co/Q2XgGRP4gg https://t.co/ScE0pwD5Ae

name: ABC
text:
"Minds were made up on Capitol Hill."
 
John Bolton defends his decision not to testify during the impeachment trial, telling @martharaddatz, "It would not have made a difference." https://t.co/jiL4cpAnp7 https://t.co/P3z87I43AM

name: ABC
text: John Bolton on impeachment process: "I think the House Democrats built a cliff, they threw themselves off of it. And halfway down, they looked up and saw me, and said, 'Hey, why don't you come along?'" https://t.co/8MKqU8R35l https://t.co/JfSA4a5695

name: ABC
text: EXCLUSIVE: John Bolton tells @MarthaRaddatz that the claim Pres. Trump was generally concerned about corruption in Ukraine was "utter nonsense." https://t.co/Aaye3cMCng https://t.co/uAoEcACI2D
